the same principle as before, we can use a translation tool to convert the text from en-US to el without any interaction between the two languages. This means that the translation will be done solely based on the linguistic rules and patterns of the target language, without taking into account any cultural or contextual differences between the two languages. This approach may result in a less accurate translation, as it does not consider the nuances and idiomatic expressions of the source language.
